meanings.definition: A flight of an aircraft over a particular area.
meanings.sent1: During the air show, the flypasts of the fighter jets amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent2: The military planes performed impressive flypasts over the city during the parade.
meanings.sent3: The flypasts of the birds in the park made the squirrels curious.
meanings.sent4: The flypasts of memories in her mind brought back nostalgic feelings.
meanings.sent5: The flypasts of colorful kites in the sky delighted the children.

meanings.definition: The act of flying past a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The flypasts of the geese over the lake were a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The flypasts of the airplanes over the stadium added excitement to the event.
meanings.sent3: The flypasts of the bees near the flowers were like a tiny air show.
meanings.sent4: The flypasts of time seemed to speed up as the deadline approached.
meanings.sent5: The flypasts of leaves in the wind created a mesmerizing dance.
